result.execSummary:
The defendant Tyrel R Zurcher was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

12/12/17 COURT ORDERS THAT DEFENDANT MUST PAY A MINIMUM MONTHLY PAYMENT OF $50.00 OR MORE BEGINNING JANUARY 2018 FOR RESTITUTION.

If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

15CF477
Court relates and orders: Imposed and stayed sentence of 1 year initial confinement, 2 years extended supervision, 3 years probation, and 2 months jail time which may be served in Chippewa County if no charge to Barron County,  work release and  35 days credit to run concurrent with Chippewa County jail time.  AODA and any other treatment or program recomended by agent.  Defendent is eligible for Challenge Incarceration if revoked.  Sheriff's Department to arrange transportation to Chippewa County.  
15CM328
Court relates and orders:  2 years probation with condition of repayment of $2550.00 restitution, court costs and DNA surcharge.
